physical_appearance:This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are \u0027L\u0027 shaped
 featuring cotton weave with embroidery work. The hangings are decorated with colourful embroidered geometric patterns and motifs. There are small fabric hooks around the border of the hangings.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are 'L' shaped, featuring cotton weave with embroidery work. The hangings are decorated with colourful embroidered geometric patterns and motifs. There are small fabric hooks around the border of the hangings.
